articles.title: Review: The 2023 Yeti SB120 is a Comfortable Trail Cruiser - Pinkbike.com
articles.description: We put Yeti's newest short travel machine to the test.
articles.content: DescendingThere's less room to hide a strange leverage curve or odd shock tune on a bike with 120mm of travel. In this case, Yeti's engineers and suspension technicians don't need to worry about hidi… [+3200 chars]
